Calculando el punto crítico $\boldsymbol{\alpha(s,t)}$, que está determinado:

$\boldsymbol{\alpha(s,t)=\mu + \frac{(s\theta^2)}{2}}$


$$ Q = \begin{pmatrix} -\lambda & \lambda \\ \mu & -\mu\end{pmatrix}$$


$\pi =(\frac{\mu}{\lambda + \mu};\frac{\lambda}{\lambda + \mu})$

$\boldsymbol{\alpha(s,t)=log\{ \vec{\pi} exp[(Q + Hs) t] \vec{1} \}}$

$\alpha(s,t)=log\{ (\frac{\mu}{\lambda + \mu};\frac{\lambda}{\lambda + \mu}) exp[\begin{pmatrix} -\lambda & \lambda \\ \mu & -\mu + hs\end{pmatrix} t] \vec{1} \}$
